createTable.create 1: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Levels (level_id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,block_id INTEGER,difficulty INTEGER,level_xml varchar(1500),location_offset INTEGER,end_offset INTEGER,play_count INTEGER,fail_count INTEGER,best_score INTEGER,original_score INTEGER,running_score INTEGER, disease_link varchar(100),disease_category varchar(100),highscore_user varchar(60),bio_off INTEGER NOT NULL,block_id_temp INTEGER NOT NULL,in_XML BOOLEAN DEFAULT true)
createTable.create 2: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Solutions (level_id INTEGER NOT NULL,player_id varchar(50),uploaded BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,PRIMARY KEY(level_id,player_id))
